snippet.title: ArcheBlade™ on Steam: The Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The wait is over.  The Official Launch Trailer is Out!
Play ArcheBlade on Steam:  http://store.steampowered.com/app/207230
Community Hub: http://steamcommunity.com/app/207230
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Codebrush
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CodeBrush

Based on a Korean Fantasy Novel, ArcheBlade is a free to play 3D multiplayer fighting game that captures the essence of combo-based fighting games combined with online multiplayer game modes.  Play as one of many unique characters and master your skills to become the best fighter.
